name: restaurant-inventory-system
description: Restaurant Inventory Management System with OCR capabilities

scripts.build: npm run install:backend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
